name: Image Display
description: Use to display a relevant image (e.g., figure, diagram, architecture) from the paper. Provide the image URL.

image_url.description: The direct URL to the image file (e.g., PNG, JPG, SVG). Ensure the URL is publicly accessible.

alt_text.description: Descriptive text for the image (for accessibility and if the image fails to load).

caption.description: (Optional) A brief caption to display below the image.
